name: Kron
description:
This is my first game that I made in Unity3D. It took me a week~ for making this game as I was Learning as well as Developing this game. It is free to play with no ads. 

I've tested it only on ArchLinux but not on Windows but I have provied build for it.

Android verision is also provided but for more cooler experiance use Linux GNU\Linux or Windows version. Also u should have Mobile phone with some decant hardware

PS: Just tell me if u find Bug and I will smash it for ya :)
